settinggroup.name: arcade
settinggroup.title: Arcade Settings
settinggroup.description: This section allows you to control various aspects of the arcade (arcade.php), such as how many games to show per page, and which features to enable or disable.

setting.name: enablearcade
setting.title: Enable Arcade Functionality
setting.description: If you wish to disable the arcade on your board, set this option to no.

setting.name: arcade_stats
setting.title: Show Statistic Box
setting.description: Allows you to set whether or not the statistic box will be shown at the top of the arcade home page.

setting.name: arcade_stats_newgames
setting.title: Newest Games/Most Played Games
setting.description: The number of newest games and most played games to show on the statistics box.

setting.name: arcade_stats_newchamps
setting.title: Newest Champions
setting.description: The number of newest champions to show in the statistic box.

setting.name: arcade_stats_newscores
setting.title: Latest Scores
setting.description: Number of latest scores to show in the statistic box.

setting.name: arcade_stats_bestplayers
setting.title: Show Best Players
setting.description: Do you wish to show a box of the three best players in the statistic box?

setting.name: arcade_stats_avatar
setting.title: Show Avatar
setting.description: Do you wish to show the user's avatar on the Best Players section?

setting.name: gamesperpage
setting.title: Games Per Page
setting.description: The number of games to show per page on the arcade page.

setting.name: gamessortby
setting.title: Default Sort Games By
setting.description: Select the field that you want games to be sorted by default.
setting.optionscode: select name=Name date=Date Added plays=Times Played lastplayed=Date Last Played rating=Rating

setting.name: gamesorder
setting.title: Default Game Ordering
setting.description:
Select the order that you want games to be sorted by default.
Ascending: A-Z / beginning-end
Descending: Z-A / end-beginning

setting.name: arcade_category_number
setting.title: Number Of Categories Per Row
setting.description: The number of categories to display on a single row of the category table. It is recommended that this value be no higher than 10.

setting.name: arcade_newgame
setting.title: Days For New Game
setting.description: The number of days a game will be marked as new after being added.

setting.name: arcade_ratings
setting.title: Game Ratings
setting.description: Do you wish to allow games to be rated? Group permission can be set on Group Management page.

setting.name: arcade_searching
setting.title: Game Searching
setting.description: Do you wish to allow users to search for games based on name, description and category? Group permission can be set on Group Management page.

setting.name: arcade_whosonline
setting.title: Who's Online Display
setting.description: Do you wish to show a box of who is online in the arcade and who can view it?
setting.optionscode: radio 0=Disabled 1=Arcade Moderators and Administrators only 2=Registered Members 3=Everyone

setting.name: arcade_onlineimage
setting.title: Online Image
setting.description: Do you wish to show an image of where the user currently is in the arcade?

setting.name: scoresperpage
setting.title: Scores Per Page
setting.description: The number of scores to show per page on the score page.

setting.name: arcade_editcomment
setting.title: Comment Edit Time Limit
setting.description: The number of minutes until regular users cannot edit their own score comments. Enter 0 (zero) for no limit.

setting.name: arcade_maxcommentlength
setting.title: Maximum Score Comment Length
setting.description: The maximum number of characters a score comment can be. Cannot be larger than 200 characters.

setting.name: statsperpage
setting.title: Stats Per Page
setting.description: The number of games to show per page on the stats page. It is recommended this be no higher than 15.

setting.name: gamesperpageoptions
setting.title: User Selectable Games Per Page
setting.description: If you would like to allow users to select how many games per page are shown in the arcade, enter the options they should be able to select separated with commas. If this is left blank they will not be able to choose how many games are shown per page.

setting.name: scoresperpageoptions
setting.title: User Selectable Scores Per Page
setting.description: If you would like to allow users to select how many scores per page are shown on score pages, enter the options they should be able to select separated with commas. If this is left blank they will not be able to choose how many scores are shown per page.

setting.name: arcade_postbit
setting.title: Display Championships On Postbit
setting.description: Do you wish to display a user's championships on the postbit?

setting.name: arcade_postbitlimit
setting.title: Maximum Championships On Postbit
setting.description: Enter the maximum number of championships that should be shown on the postbit. Enter 0 (zero) for no limit.

settinggroup.name: tournaments
settinggroup.title: Tournament Settings
settinggroup.description: Various options with relation to the Arcade tournament system (tournaments.php) can be managed and set here.

setting.name: enabletournaments
setting.title: Enable Tournament Functionality
setting.description: If you wish to disable the tournament feature on your board, set this option to no.

setting.name: tournamentperpage
setting.title: Tournaments Per Page
setting.description: The number of tournaments to show per page on the arcade tournament pages.

setting.name: tournaments_numrounds
setting.title: Number Of Rounds
setting.description: The user selectable number of rounds for a tournament. The higher the number, the more players can participate (2 rounds = 4 players, 4 rounds = 16 players).

setting.name: tournaments_numtries
setting.title: Number Of Tries Per Round
setting.description: The user selectable number of tries a player has to get the best score possible in a round.

setting.name: tournaments_numdays
setting.title: Number Of Days Per Round
setting.description: The user selectable number of days a single round will last.

setting.name: tournaments_canceltime
setting.title: Tournament Cancel Time
setting.description: The amount of time a tournament has (in days) to get players before it is cancelled.
